holdables

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • holdables.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Holdable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Holdable
    A tile that can be placed on the gameboard or in the silk bag.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Joseph Omar, Martin Samm, Joshua Murray
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
